common.GENERIC_ERROR_TXT: Something went wrong. Try closing and reopening the app.

onboard.FACE_ID_ALERT_1: Face ID is not enabled on your device.
onboard.FACE_ID_MESSAGE_1: Please setup Face ID in your device's settings to enable this security feature.
onboard.BIOMETRIC_LOGIN: Do you want to turn on Biometric Login?
onboard.ACCESS_ACCOUNT: Access your account more quickly and easily by activating biometric login.
onboard.FORCE_LOGOUT_TXT: For security reasons you have been logged out. Please sign in again.
onboard.INVALID_EMAIL_MESSAGE: You have entered an email address that is invalid. Please try again.
onboard.EMAIL_DOESNT_EXIST_TITLE: The email you entered is not associated with an account.
onboard.EMAIL_DOESNT_EXIST_MESSAGE: You can find your email by viewing your account through the upwards website or reaching out to your employer.
onboard.NO_EMAIL_DETECTED_MESSAGE: Please enter a valid email address below to continue.
onboard.NEITHER_OLD_OR_NEW_MOBILE_CLIENTOPTIONS_: Your employer is not yet using the new upwards Mobile experience.
onboard.LOGIN_DISABlED: Your login is disabled. Please contact upwards for assistance.
onboard.OLD_CLIENTOPTION_ENABLED_NOT_NEW: Your employer is currently using our previous Mobile app version. Please search for upwards benefits in the Appstore to access.
onboard.MULTIPLE_VALID_USERS: The email you entered is associated with multiple employers which is not currently supported. Check back as this will be included in an update coming soon.
onboard.MULTIPLE_VALID_USERS_AT_CLIENT: The email entered matches multiple accounts at your employer. Please try another email to login.
onboard.VERIFY_ACCOUNT: To verify your account, we sent a link to your email you entered on the first screen. Please go to that email and click on that link to continue.
onboard.NO_EMAIL: Didn't receive an email? Please check your spam folder or click below to resend an email.
onboard.SETUP_MFA: To set up multifactor authentication for the next time you login, please enter a phone number you want to be associated with this account.
onboard.RATES_APPLY: By entering your phone number, you are agreeing to receive a one-time automated message from upwards. Standard messging rates may apply.
onboard.CODE_RESEND: You have entered a code which has expired. Please click Resend Code.
onboard.CODE_LOCK: Entering an incorrect code multiple times will result in your account being locked.
onboard.SUSPICIOUS_ACTIVITY: We have detected suspicious activity from your device.
onboard.DEVICE_LOCKED: Your device has been locked out. Please try again later.
onboard.ENTER_CODE_MESSAGE: To confirm your phone number, we have sent a code to your phone:
onboard.NO_CODE_DISCLAIMER_TXT: After timer has elapsed, click Resend Code to receive a new verification code.
onboard.RESET_NUMBER: I need to update my phone number.
onboard.HELP_MESSAGE_1: To login, you will need to use either the
onboard.HELP_MESSAGE_2: Work Email, Personal Email, or Alternate Email
onboard.HELP_MESSAGE_4: If you're unsure what email to use, you can view your account on the upwards website.
onboard.ENHANCE_WITH_BIOMETRICS: Enhance your login experience with biometrics.
onboard.BIOMETRICS_NOTE: Note: Enabling biometric login for upwards will grant access to your biometric information saved on this device.
onboard.UPDATE_REQUIRED_START_TXT: A new update is available. Please visit the
onboard.UPDATE_REQUIRED_END_TXT: to update your app before logging in.
onboard.MULTIPLE_ACCOUNTS: You have two or more active accounts. Please select one to access your account.
onboard.SMS_ERROR_MESSAGE: An error was hit and we were unable to log you in. Please try re-entering the code you received.
onboard.APP_UPDATE_PROGRESS: Please Pardon our dust, while we make room for new code.
onboard.CODE_PUSH_MESSAGE: Pardon our dust while we make room for this update.
onboard.ENABLE_NOTIFICATIONS_TXT: We will notify you of special updates, enrollment deadlines and etc. Don't worry, you can always turn off notifications whenever you want.
